original_text: His father and mother did not know that it was from the Lord, for he was seeking an opportunity against the Philistines. At that time the Philistines ruled over Israel.
korean_text: 그 때에 블레셋 사람이 이스라엘을 다스린 까닭에 삼손이 틈을 타서 블레셋 사람을 치려 함이었으나 그의 부모는 이 일이 여호와께로부터 나온 것인 줄은 알지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: His father and mother did not know
that it was from the Lord
for he was seeking an opportunity against the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 블레셋 사람을 칠 기회를 찾고 있었기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: At that time the Philistines ruled over Israel
